name: iStay.com
tag_list: hotels, travel, price-comparison, hotel-search-engine, search, accommodation, consumer-travel, holidays
overview:
iStay.com is a hotel search engine.

It’s mission is to make it easy for users to find, compare and research hotels worldwide.

As of September 2009, iStay.com holds detailed information on over 150,000 hotels in 25,000 cities in over 200 countries.

Alongside a wealth of valuable data on each hotel, iStay.com provides full availability checking and price comparison services ensuring that once users have chosen a hotel they get the best possible price.

iStay.com is completely free to use and as we have no direct relationship with any hotels completely impartial too.
